title: Do Not Call List
lede: Manage compliance with do-not-call regulations and customer preferences.

sections.title: DNC List Management
sections.content:
Maintain compliance with do-not-call regulations and respect customer preferences.

Features:

  • Import Lists: Upload official DNC registry files
  • Manual Additions: Add individual numbers manually
  • Auto-exclusion: Automatically filter from campaigns
  • Suppression Lists: Custom suppression categories

sections.title: Compliance Tools
sections.content:
Stay compliant with federal and state regulations.

  • Registry Updates: Regular updates from official sources
  • Opt-out Processing: Handle customer opt-out requests
  • Time Restrictions: Honor calling time preferences
  • Audit Trail: Track all DNC activities

metaTitle: Do Not Call List - Compliance Management | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Manage DNC lists for compliance. Import suppression lists and ensure regulatory compliance for calling campaigns.
metaKeywords: do not call, DNC list, compliance, suppression list, regulatory compliance, TCPA, call regulations
